title: #69: SKINdependence Day - Skin Care, Beauty & Independence
itunes:title: #69: SKINdependence Day - Skin Care, Beauty & Independence
description:
On this episode we discuss our recent departure from our old network partner Podcast One. We dive into the pros and cons of working with a network. On the second half of the show we interview Skincare and Beauty expert Renée Maloney. We dive into acne, dark circles, sun damage, and anti aging techniques. 

To learn more about Renée and Spa Kingston check them out here

Lauryn's Favorite Caffeinated Sunscreen here
Assistant.to can be found here
Tendskin can be found here

To connect with Lauryn
To connect with Michael
